text: <@U6A936746> we would really like to use ChainRules for differentiation in Symbolics, but we need something like <https://github.com/JuliaDiff/ChainRulesCore.jl/issues/246> so we're still using DiffRules in 2021

text:
Yeah, I have been think about it.
A lot of my hesitation is about not wanting it to be used by conventional AD.
But maybe it would be OK as a gateway drug
